original_text: Balaam also the son of Beor, the soothsayer, did the children of Israel slay with the sword among them that were slain by them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 그들을 살륙하는 중에 브올의 아들 점술가 발람도 칼날로 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: Balaam also the son of Beor
did the children of Israel slay with the sword
among them that were slain by them
